name: Splat! (itch) (Michael Anderson)
description:
This is a short game I made with a friend of mine. We both worked simultaneously on all of the aspects, but I was most responsible for level design, character movement, and animations.

The Title screen is a little broken currently, but If you click in the bottom right you can start the game.

Use AD to move left/right and SPACE to jump and double jump

While holding against a wall press SPACE to jump up the wall

Enjoy! :)
